page.title: 07Health, Murroes
page.content: As there is no Health Clinic in the area, local people are normally registered with Doctors and Dentists in Dundee or Forfar. Hospitals are also centred in Dundee, the two main general hospitals being Ninewells and Dundee Royal Infirmary. There is a Health Clinic at Whitfield, Dundee, which is a local base for the School Doctor, Dentist, Nurses and Health Visitors. Routine {medical inspections}for pupils are carried out annually by the School Doctor and Nurse, while the School Dentist visits each school twice per session with a mobile surgery to carry out inspections and treatment. Pupils' eyesight and hearing are checked annually by the orthoptist and audiographer.
